title: Part 2: Joel McHale + News (ACS July 15)
itunes:title: Part 2: Joel McHale + News (ACS July 15)
description:
Actor and comedian Joel McHale joins Adam in the studio to talk about his new show cooking show ‘Celebrity Beef’. He remembers how when he was on ‘Community’, they were always on the verge of cancellation and how he had lunch with Adam the day ‘The Soup’ was cancelled. Joel talks about his struggles with dyslexia, especially when reading off the prompter when he hosted ‘The Soup’. Joel then impersonates Adam’s dad on the trumpet as Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Armie Hammer reportedly selling timeshares and Kevin Spacey being charged in Britain. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

Geico.com 

The Jordan Harbinger Show
